DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Surgical Treatment Aorto-iliac Occlusive Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Patients aorto-iliac occlusive disease ( TASC , type D ) operate totally laparoscopic aortobifemoral bypass operation open aortobifemoral bypass operation follow result compare two procedure basis primary endpoint , composite endpoint define combined incidence systemic morbidity , graft thrombosis all-cause mortality . Secondary endpoint like length hospital stay , operation time , bleed time shall also consider . Besides short form- 36 ( SF-36 ) shall use evaluation patient health relate quality life , preoperatively,1,3 , 6 month 1 year post-operatively . Early , midterm long time result shall follow .
DOC.criteria: All patient TASC D lesion aortoiliac segment amenable previously unsuccessfully treated endovascular approach . Unsuitable surgery due general health status
